EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-General.Email 3_Public-private hybrid cloud video
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia cloud approach improves flexibility and reduces hidden costs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> How a Nokia cloud can expand your business options and deliver 25 percent savings Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Your move to a cloud environment should improve operations and lower costs — especially hidden costs.
Watch the video "Why is cloud a vital topic for enterprises <[[http://resources.nokia.com/asset/200885?did=d000000000at&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 3a-hybridcloudvideo&utm_term=general]]>?" to discover how your legacy architecture is hindering your business and how an enterprise cloud from Nokia can not only expand your business options but also reduce TCO by a minimum of 25 percent!
I hope that you enjoy this video! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
